review_blob: Head is light tan and thick,lasting throughout. Color is dark reddish brown. Taste heavy on the banana,also clove, brown sugar, nutmeg,slightly bitter hop and very sweet flavors combined. Medium to heavy body. Great aftertaste. Just a fantastic beer from the group......One of the best.

Great caramel notes on this unique tasting beer, one of my favorite thats always in my beer fridge for enjoyment.  Great medium bodied beer, that is crisp and has a nice lingering brown sugar aftertaste.  I give it an A+ from two bros.........

Ok.....Been seeing a lot of dull tasting notes here.....Look, it is what it IS.  A light citrus sour mash that is poundable on the porch of your fav. Pub on a hot summer day people!  Its no Oberon.  It doesnt even compare.  Great color and a real citrus note at the finish.  I enjoyed all 6 of them.  I dont think it will do well as a 6pk, but is great out of the tap.  :)

I think this is a Quality Heffe for Cincinnati Water people!  Good citrus notes, great bananna flav.  Clovey hints are there, as I sip.  I think this and his Oatmeal Stout are the strong front runners of thier selections.

Great Example of a good Amber, Malty toasty flavour.  Great smooth finish.  My wife loveeesss Fat Tire, so I put her to a blind taste test and she had no Idea of what each beer was. She chose this over the Fatness!  She does have a pretty good palate and was shocked, lol!
Nectar of the GODS.  What else can you say about Larrys Wonderful Reciepe, except I think he may have had to sell his soul to the Devil for this!
